title: Arctic Berry VB Edition Nicotine Pouches By 77
description: TRY 77 ARCTIC BERRY NICOTINE POUCHES Arctic Berry VB Edition nicotine pouches by 77 invites you to indulge in a delightful fusion of fruity flavours that tantalize the palate. With each pouch, experience the harmonious blend of rich, fruity arctic berries. The combination offers a refreshing and invigorating sensation, delivering a unique twist on traditional nicotine pouch flavors. View all 77 Pouches View all Fruity Pouches View all Extra Strong Pouches KEY FEATURES: 20MG Per Gram | 13MG Per Pouch Fruity flavoured nicotine pouches Recommended for experienced users Tobacco-free, smoke-free and vapour-free 20 pouches in each can MORE ABOUT ARCTIC BERRIES FLAVOURED NICOTINE POUCHES Flavours of vibrant fruity berries come together in the artic berries VB Edition Nicotine Pouches. A wonderful medley of flavours will dance across your tongue with each pouch, providing a one-of-a-kind and energising experience. The sweet tang of the fruitiness cuts through the rich, slightly sweet undertone of the berries. For individuals in search of a strong and unique nicotine experience, this is the perfect option because to the harmonic balance of flavours that is both refreshing and fulfilling. MORE ABOUT 77 NICOTINE POUCHES 77 were the first polish brand of tobacco-free nicotine pouches. 77 offers one of the most diverse ranges of flavour on the market, 77 also hit the sweet spot with their nicotine levels. Switch up, switch down, mix and match â€“ do whatever suits you best! flavours range from different types of mint to peach, apple, strawberries, and even classic tobacco.
